body:
Most of you might know me from being one of the _Ezbla's or maybe being the best at pvp out of the ezbla's other's may not know me, other's may know me as rude selfish cocky uptight and other's look at me like a friend.

How ever you look at me bad or good I have been extremely rude, mostly to staff member's and if you don't believe me you may want to check my sexy infractions for which are about 20 million... 

So I really want to say Sorry to my friends that I was rude to like para or polar or zeus So I wanted to say sorry not trying to get a staff rank I am trying to be a decent person and doing the right thing.

title: I have been rude.

replies.body:
I think all will forgive you, if you are nice ingame and in the forums.
Ingame: Don't get any infraction for the next time.
Forum: Don't make attantion seeking threads or spam threads. Helping others by forums things is kind also. And don't be rude...
I don't have so much to do with you, but were really rude, from that what I saw.
If I had somethind to do with you, I would not accept your Apology.
